===Overview===
The '''Inca Empire''' or Ican Empire was the largest empire in pre-Columbian [[South America]] and possibly the largest empire in the world in the early 16th century.

===Origin===
The center of the empire was located in [[Cusco]] in modern-day Peru. 

The [[City of the Space Gods]] was a network of ancient Incan temples located in a secret region high in the [[Andes Mountains]]. Centuries ago, it was visited by the [[Glossary:Third Host|Third Celestial Host]]. The Incan natives built the temples in honor of the [[Celestials]], whom they regarded as Space Gods. They created a great Galaxy Plaque made of stone carved in the likeness of an ancient space craft. They also carved a stone facsimile of a three-passenger descent vehicle which hung suspended in one of the chambers. Beneath one of the temples was an underground water channel which led into a massive well located in the courtyard of the God Chamber.{{r|Eternals Vol 1 1}}

[[Ajak (Earth-616)|Tecumotzin]] better known as "[[Ajak]]" of the [[Eternals]]; protected Earth and the Incan people from "[[Skrulls|Demonic interlopers]]" from [[Uku Pacha]], the Lower World".{{r|Incredible Hercules #117}}

The despot of Kandahar hired [[Gatecrasher (Earth-TRN295)|Gatecrasher]] to acquire a 14th-century Incan mathematical model of the universe. {{r|Captain Britain Vol 2 #12}}

===[[Spanish Empire]]===
In 1533 A.D., Conquistador [[Francisco Pizarro (Earth-616)|Francisco Pizarro]] defeated the [[Incan Empire]] and established [[Delvadia]] as a Spanish colony.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Delvadia]]'s entry}}
	  

==Culture==
===Religion===
The Incans worshiped the '''[[Apu]]''' an extra-dimensional race who later absorbed and assimilated the gods of their neighboring tribes into the pantheon. The lived in a realm known as "'''[[Hanan Pacha]]'''" The Earthly realm was known as "'''[[Kay Pacha]]'''" well the underworld was "'''[[Uku Pacha]]'''".
